name: Ghoul Gambit
description:
Embark upon an adventure as your local tavern becomes overrun by ghouls!  Defend your tavern using your magical ability to harness books for magic spells.  Cast (by throwing) books to kill the attacking ghouls. See how long you can last! 

This is a VR Game Jam 2022 submission with theme "One Time Use."  Each book can only be used once and with its wide variety of possible names, unlikely to see the same book with over 300,000 combinations!

Linkira Studios partned with Timps from GameDevBits to help create this game.  We hope you enjoy!

Assets Used

1) Fantasy Skybox by Render Knight 

2) Fantastic Interior Pack by Tidal Flask Studios

3) Painted Ghoul Crew by Bitgem 

4) Magic Arsenal by Archanor VFX 

Music

Fight Till Dying (Remastered) by MUZ 

Options

PCVR. 

  1. Unpack zip file
  2. Air Link with Oculus or Use Connected VR set to PC
  3. Open Unpacked Executable named Ghoul Gambit and it should load

OCULUS APK. Still Testing, have bug where half the screen is black on export.

Bugs

  • Particles don't always kill the Ghouls.  Workaround hit them with the book.

How to Play

  • Left Control Stick - Move
  • Right Control Stick - Turn (Pressing Back on stick does a 180)
  • Grip - Grabs Books
  • Release Grip - Throw
  • Trigger - Activate Restart Button
